canceltimer.name: CancelTimer
canceltimer.description: Grants permission to cancel a previously started timer and record a TimerCanceled event in the history

cancelworkflowexecution.name: CancelWorkflowExecution
cancelworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionCanceled event in the history

completeworkflowexecution.name: CompleteWorkflowExecution
completeworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionCompleted event in the history

continueasnewworkflowexecution.name: ContinueAsNewWorkflowExecution
continueasnewworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and start a new workflow execution of the same type using the same workflow ID and a unique run Id

countclosedworkflowexecutions.name: CountClosedWorkflowExecutions
countclosedworkflowexecutions.description: Grants permission to return the number of closed workflow executions within the given domain that meet the specified filtering criteria

countopenworkflowexecutions.name: CountOpenWorkflowExecutions
countopenworkflowexecutions.description: Grants permission to return the number of open workflow executions within the given domain that meet the specified filtering criteria

countpendingactivitytasks.name: CountPendingActivityTasks
countpendingactivitytasks.description: Grants permission to return the estimated number of activity tasks in the specified task list

countpendingdecisiontasks.name: CountPendingDecisionTasks
countpendingdecisiontasks.description: Grants permission to return the estimated number of decision tasks in the specified task list

deleteactivitytype.name: DeleteActivityType
deleteactivitytype.description: Grants permission to delete the specified activity type

deleteworkflowtype.name: DeleteWorkflowType
deleteworkflowtype.description: Grants permission to delete the specified workflow type

deprecateactivitytype.name: DeprecateActivityType
deprecateactivitytype.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified activity type

deprecatedomain.name: DeprecateDomain
deprecatedomain.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified domain

deprecateworkflowtype.name: DeprecateWorkflowType
deprecateworkflowtype.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified workflow type

describeactivitytype.name: DescribeActivityType
describeactivitytype.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified activity type

describedomain.name: DescribeDomain
describedomain.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified domain, including its description and status

describeworkflowexecution.name: DescribeWorkflowExecution
describeworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified workflow execution including its type and some statistics

describeworkflowtype.name: DescribeWorkflowType
describeworkflowtype.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified workflow type

failworkflowexecution.name: FailWorkflowExecution
failworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionFailed event in the history

getworkflowexecutionhistory.name: GetWorkflowExecutionHistory
getworkflowexecutionhistory.description: Grants permission to return the history of the specified workflow execution

listactivitytypes.name: ListActivityTypes
listactivitytypes.description: Grants permission to return information about all activities registered in the specified domain that match the specified name and registration status

listclosedworkflowexecutions.name: ListClosedWorkflowExecutions
listclosedworkflowexecutions.description: Grants permission to return a list of closed workflow executions in the specified domain that meet the filtering criteria

listdomains.name: ListDomains
listdomains.description: Grants permission to return the list of domains registered in the account

listopenworkflowexecutions.name: ListOpenWorkflowExecutions
listopenworkflowexecutions.description: Grants permission to return a list of open workflow executions in the specified domain that meet the filtering criteria

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS SWF resource

listworkflowtypes.name: ListWorkflowTypes
listworkflowtypes.description: Grants permission to return information about workflow types in the specified domain

pollforactivitytask.name: PollForActivityTask
pollforactivitytask.description: Grants permission to workers to get an ActivityTask from the specified activity taskList

pollfordecisiontask.name: PollForDecisionTask
pollfordecisiontask.description: Grants permission to deciders to get a DecisionTask from the specified decision taskList

recordactivitytaskheartbeat.name: RecordActivityTaskHeartbeat
recordactivitytaskheartbeat.description: Grants permission to workers to report to the service that the ActivityTask represented by the specified taskToken is still making progress

recordmarker.name: RecordMarker
recordmarker.description: Grants permission to record a MarkerRecorded event in the history

registeractivitytype.name: RegisterActivityType
registeractivitytype.description: Grants permission to register a new activity type along with its configuration settings in the specified domain

registerdomain.name: RegisterDomain
registerdomain.description: Grants permission to register a new domain

registerworkflowtype.name: RegisterWorkflowType
registerworkflowtype.description: Grants permission to register a new workflow type and its configuration settings in the specified domain

requestcancelactivitytask.name: RequestCancelActivityTask
requestcancelactivitytask.description: Grants permission to attempt to cancel a previously scheduled activity task

requestcancelexternalworkflowexecution.name: RequestCancelExternalWorkflowExecution
requestcancelexternalworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to request that a request be made to cancel the specified external workflow execution

requestcancelworkflowexecution.name: RequestCancelWorkflowExecution
requestcancelworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionCancelRequested event in the currently running workflow execution identified by the given domain, workflowId, and runId

respondactivitytaskcanceled.name: RespondActivityTaskCanceled
respondactivitytaskcanceled.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken was successfully canceled

respondactivitytaskcompleted.name: RespondActivityTaskCompleted
respondactivitytaskcompleted.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken completed successfully with a result (if provided)

respondactivitytaskfailed.name: RespondActivityTaskFailed
respondactivitytaskfailed.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken has failed with reason (if specified)

responddecisiontaskcompleted.name: RespondDecisionTaskCompleted
responddecisiontaskcompleted.description: Grants permission to deciders to tell the service that the DecisionTask identified by the taskToken has successfully completed

scheduleactivitytask.name: ScheduleActivityTask
scheduleactivitytask.description: Grants permission to schedule an activity task

signalexternalworkflowexecution.name: SignalExternalWorkflowExecution
signalexternalworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to request a signal to be delivered to the specified external workflow execution and records

signalworkflowexecution.name: SignalWorkflowExecution
signalworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionSignaled event in the workflow execution history and create a decision task for the workflow execution identified by the given domain, workflowId and runId

startchildworkflowexecution.name: StartChildWorkflowExecution
startchildworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to request that a child workflow execution be started

starttimer.name: StartTimer
starttimer.description: Grants permission to start a timer for a workflow execution

startworkflowexecution.name: StartWorkflowExecution
startworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to start an execution of the workflow type in the specified domain using the provided workflowId and input data

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS SWF resource

terminateworkflowexecution.name: TerminateWorkflowExecution
terminateworkflowexecution.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionTerminated event and force closure of the workflow execution identified by the given domain, runId, and workflowId

undeprecateactivitytype.name: UndeprecateActivityType
undeprecateactivitytype.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated activity type

undeprecatedomain.name: UndeprecateDomain
undeprecatedomain.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated domain

undeprecateworkflowtype.name: UndeprecateWorkflowType
undeprecateworkflowtype.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated workflow type

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an AWS SWF resource
